Introduction 21.1 Delivering sustainable places is an important aspect of spatial planning to address the needs and priorities of Tower Hamlets, such as building a significant number of homes to reduce overcrowding, and delivering long term benefits to people and communities across the borough. Successful place-making is critical to creating cohesive, well-connected and more vibrant communities and ensuring that development responds positively to the distinct and unique characteristics which make Tower Hamlets a great place to live, work and visit.
